section.title: The jmol-users mailing list
section.p: The jmol-users@lists.sf.net mailing list is for general discussion of Jmol issues. Only list members may post to the list.

Click here
to subscribe or unsubscribe to jmol-users@lists.sf.net

For a history of messages that have been posted you may browse the jmol-users@lists.sf.net
mailing list archives.

section.title: The jmol-developers mailing list
section.p: The jmol-developers@lists.sf.net mailing list is for specific discussion of Jmol software development issues.
We assume that all subscribers to jmol-developers are also subscribers to jmol-users. Therefore, messages should not be posted to both jmol-developers and jmol-users.

Click here
to subscribe or unsubscribe to jmol-developers@lists.sf.net

For a history of messages that have been posted you may browse the jmol-developers@lists.sf.net
mailing list archives.
